hadiths.text: It was narrated from Masruq that:Abdullah was asked about a man who married a woman and died without having consummated the marriage with her, nor stipulating the dowry. Abdullah said: “The dowry is hers, and the inheritance is hers and she has to observe the waiting period.” Ma'qil bin Sinan Al-Ashja'i said: “I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) pass a similar ruling concerning Birwa' bint Washiq.” (Sahih) Another chain from 'Alqamah, from Abdullah, with similar wording. chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَتَزَوَّجُ وَلاَ يَفْرِضُ لَهَا فَيَمُوتُ عَلَى ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: A man who gets married without stipulating the dowry and then dies
